text: In Little Italy is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithIn Little ItalyJennifer M. Bean. Flickers of Desire: Movie Stars of the 1910s and stars Marion Leonard, George Nichols, and Henry B. Walthall. ==Actors== * Marion Leonard - Marie Cadrone * George Nichols - Tony Guiletto * Henry B. Walthall - Victor * Charles Arling * Kate Bruce - At the Ball * William J. Butler - In Bar * Charles Craig - At the Ball * Adele DeGarde * Gladys Egan - One of the Children * Frank Evans - Sheriff's Deputy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: In Little Italy
